channel.title: Server Development
channel.description:
I feel that server/client develpoments are getting out of hand latley and i feel somthing must be said
If u are going to start a development group make sure it will becuase there some fourm members that need helping and they come to the correct section and they hardly get help due to the post getting knocked away by a swarm of server develepoments
Also i see many qustion that look untidy and i feel that there should be a template you have to request with this what i feel should make a good template
[b][size=10pt]If Error[/size][/b]
[b]Latest Code Added[/b][code]You Code Here[/code] [b]Compile error[/b][code]Your code here[/code]
[code][b]Latest Code Added[/b][ code]You Code Here[/ code][/code] [code][b]Compile error[/b][ code]Your code here[/ code][/code]
[b][size=10pt]If Question[/size][/b]
[b]Your Questions[/b]Text Here [b]Explain Your Question[/b]Text Here
[code] [b]Your Questions[/b]Text Here [b]Explain Your Question[/b]Text Here [/code]

item.title: Server Development
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

Yes but people wonder why mitb picks on them and that is because they act like kids yes the main resaon is they play moparscape but its because they spam and they make spelling mistakes all the time and they spend 2 minuites posting questions when they should take time to construct there question.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Development
item.dc:creator: @Sonis Sonis
item.description:
@Sonis wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:2, topic:168470”]ncie idea, doubt it will get used though :\ nobody every wants to follow the rules/guidelines then they complain when they get banned.[/quote] That’s true. Templates only make everything similar and comparable. I am thinking that true people who want to start a good development use a template, or just a setup thats readable. Regardless if it’s not mandatory, It would look much better than another person’s thread who wants to make a team with poorly made thread.

Read full topic

@spankjava wrote:

I feel that server/client develpoments are getting out of hand latley and i feel somthing must be said

If u are going to start a development group make sure it will becuase there some fourm members that need helping and they come to the correct section and they hardly get help due to the post getting knocked away by a swarm of server develepoments

Also i see many qustion that look untidy and i feel that there should be a template you have to request with this what i feel should make a good template
